Articles.Content:
> 
> They should figure out a release time tomorrow, so that we can have a dramatic countdown...

Actually that's not a bad idea.

If they did it well, they could even put holds in it if something screws up at the last second - like a real countdown.

"We're holding at T -10 seconds as there's an unexplained fire in the server room..."
Scott Manley is on twitch for those who care.

> 
> I just wanted to say,you guys are the best! (Yes you! The people on this forum!) I've had a blast being hyped with you guys! (and gals!) And I hope we can hype together again! **You guys are awesome!** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The hype's not over yet! We need to keep this up until 1.0 drops!

> 
> The hype's not over yet! We need to keep this up until 1.0 drops!

Oh I'm aware! I'm just saying I've had fun being hyped with yall kerbals! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Man, I wish that slow mode on twitch wasn't there, but then again, the chat would be going at SUPER-SUPERluminal speeds if it wasn't.
No SteamDB updates for 2 hours, still scratchpad, which, IIRC, is the final stage.

> 
> Oh I'm aware! I'm just saying I've had fun being hyped with yall kerbals! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

The feeling's mutual, my friend!

This needs to be UberMegaHypedHype Thread. We have long surpassed MegaHype.

I can't wait for my massive orbital scanning probe fleet to be launched!
Oh, and we just happen to be one page away from 170, BTdubs.
Yay, crash of forum

Forums were down a bit for maintainence apparently.

Also, some ppl are being a bit mean to skye on the stream ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Forum went out for a bit there! Hype is bursting from the seams!

> 
> Forum went out for a bit there! Hype is bursting from the seams!

Forum maintainence, I asked in stream.
Dang forum crash. And just when we were close to reaching 170!
Seriously, this train is really bumpy...

\*HYPE POST\*

Maybe 170 now.

Or not.

Ok, psychic powers activate! This will start page 170!

SO CLOSE!

But hey, 170 people!
Anybody else have a big outage?
170 pages! Maybe.

> 
> They should figure out a release time tomorrow, so that we can have a dramatic countdown...

Or crash the server right before it releases...

Uh, guys.... Steamdb just died.

![5NEEgQ6.png](http://i.imgur.com/5NEEgQ6.png)
Scott Manley just encountered the Kraken.

> 
> Uh, guys.... Steamdb just died.

Bet they're doing maintainance over there.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Scott Manley just encountered the Kraken.

Aw, missed it.

> 
> Uh, guys.... Steamdb just died.
> [http://i.imgur.com/5NEEgQ6.png](http://i.imgur.com/5NEEgQ6.png)

Betting when the servers crashed, everyone went to go check out steamdb.
SteamDB is back. Whew!
